titleStmt.title: Solomons sacrifice, with his prayer in Gibeon; and how God appeared to him in a vision, and answered his request. To a new tune.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
Printed on same sheet as Wing S4462 (TCP B05908), to which it serves as part 2 of 2.
